name: Maximum Security
description:
Welcome to the MAXIMUM SECURITY jail!

You are not the common convict. You want to be free. And there's nothing that can stop you from achieving your dream. 

Select your convict, shoot your way out of the jail, drive your fast getaway car and fly away to your freedom.

Good Luck!

MAXIMUM SECURITY is a short Top Down Shooter game featuring a convict trying to escape from prison.

CONTROLS:

W A S D - move

MOUSE - rotate

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - shoot

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK - pick up gun

R - reload

C - change vehicle camera
